text: hi everyone in this short video we'll be
covering how to leverage ads security
Hub to assess your ads environment
against security industry standards and
best practices we'll also look at
centralizing your security event
findings from ads partner Solutions
natively on ads security
Hub Ed security Hub is a service that
provides a Consolidated view of your
security status and is also known as a
cloud security posture Management cspm
Service that streamlines security
operations with automated continuous
security best practice checks against
your ads resources to help you identify
misconfigurations security Hub
Aggregates your security alerts I.E
findings in a standardized format and
prioritizes them so that you can more
easily enrich investigate and remediate
them the Consolidated view created
provides a dashboard environment for
exploring your organization's security
and compliance posture at a glance ads
security Hub accomplishes this by
integrating with many other ads native
services including Amazon guard Duty
Amazon inspector ads systems manager ads
firewall manager and other Amazon
partner Network Solutions and more
underneath the hood security Hub
leverages conformance packs in adabs
config to determine whether your adabs
account aligns with a specific
compliance standard and to what extent
it will also notify you with the
components that need to be updated to
meet the requirements since ads security
Hub is a fully managed service this
means that ads handles the underlying
infrastructure checks and updates to
security Hub with the latest standards
and security Hub is the easiest way to
operationalize this finally in addition
to controlling findings security Hub
also receives findings from other ABS
services such as Amazon guard Duty
Amazon inspector and Amazon Macy and
other supported third party products
therefore this provides you a single pan
of glass view into a variety of security
related controls and events we'll be
touching on the integration with abs
security Hub and thirdparty Amazon
partner Network Solutions in this
upcoming demo so with this we've
identified four key use cases of
security Hub to provide you Value First
conduct Cloud security posture
management second to initiate security
orchestration Automation and response
also known as S workflows three save
time and money by your simplifying
Integrations and four visualizing
security findings in a centralized
location to discover new insights about
events occurring in your environments so
now let's dive into the
console first let's navigate to the
summary page in security Hub upon first
startup security Hub requires you to
enable ads config for security standards
you'll see various standards and
compliance Frameworks to enable
automated Security checks go ahead and
enable security
hub from the summary page it can take up
to 2 hours to see initial findings in
your account most checks begin to run
within 30 minutes let's fast forward to
once the findings are
complete here here from the summary page
you can see what standards have been
enabled in your account and you can see
the number of pass and failed controls
per standard click on security standards
from the navigation on the left all
standards were enabled using cloud
formation when this account was
provisioned but if you scroll down if
there isn't a standard that hasn't been
enabled you simply click to enable this
standard after first time score
generation security Hub updates the
security score every 24 hours let's go
into view results for Center of Internet
Security ads Foundation Benchmark
version
1.2.0 from the top of the page you can
select tabs to show only pass failed
disabled Etc controls you can also
filter tool control based on ID let
specify ID equals
ec21 3
point click on the title security groups
should not allow Ingress from
0.0.0.0 to Port 22 this presents a view
of all resources valuated for this
particular control and the current
status of each resource EDS security Hub
also provides links to recommended
remediation instructions for each check
at the top of the page click the
remediation instructions link to open
guidance in a new
tab at the top of the page review the
security standards widget this provides
your most recent summary of a security
score and the security score of each
security Hub standard these range from 0
to 100% and represent the portion of
past controls relative to all your
enabled
controls scroll down to the graphs under
most common threat type and software
vulnerabilities with exploits here we
can view the threats and vulnerabilities
aggregated in your
account now that we have a better
understanding of our security score
against common security standards let's
go over how we might aggregate security
finding data from supported ads partner
Network APN Security Solutions to have a

compliance across your ads
environment now we'll be showing how to
access one of the partner Integrations
available Cloud
custodian Cloud custodian enables you to
manage your Cloud Resources by filtering
tagging and then applying actions to
them the yaml DSL allows definition of
rules to enable well-managed Cloud
infrastructure that's both secure and
cost
optimized open the Integrations page in
security Hub and search for cloud
custodian next click accept findings
review the permissions required for this
integration third click accept findings
this will put in place a service policy
allowing the partner solution to send
finding informations into this account
for the purposes of this Workshop a
cloud custodian instance is already set
up to automatically send findings to the
integration you just enabled to use
other partner Integrations in your
account you would still need to complete
the configure step in the partner
solution so that findings that are
created by the partner solution are then
sent to security Hub finally you can see
findings to view new findings from cloud
custodian it will take 5 to 10 minutes
for them to
appear now that the findings have been
loaded up you can view the findings that
have arrived here from cloud custodian
first for example clicking through the
finding EBS Mark unattached and looking

also looking at VPC flow log checks
having a look at the flow logs that have

with any S3 buckets that have encryption
policies that are
absent feel free to look at these
insights and these will be integrated
directly with your ads security Hub in
your
environment finally you can try ads
security Hub at no cost with a 30-day

Security Hub feature set and security
best practice checks every ABS account
in each region that is enabled with
security Hub receives a free trial
during the free trial you'll get an
estimate of your monthly bill if you are
